message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe the product is a great fit for me, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. How about $14,500? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
